title: Newly Renovayed Berkeley Home for Rent - 1,000 sq ft ($4400/mo) - Aug & Sept
posting_body: House for rent for part or all of August and September ($4,400 per month, internet/water/electricity/gas included).
Newly renovated Crafstman house in the heart of North Berekley for rent.
This adorable home provides the comfort of a clean, newly renovated space with the charm of North Berekley: 1015 sq feet, 2 bedrooms, 1 bath and a serene backyard oasis with fully furnished deck.
Renovated kitchen, renovated bathroom, brand new deck, peaceful light-filled living room.
Walkability is insane - located across the street from the bustling retail front on Hopkins Street, including a Gioia pizza, local bakery, butcher shop, cheese shop and bottle shop.
The famed Monterey Market grocery store is just two blocks away.
BART train is a 15-minute walk which will take you to downtown San Francisco in ~30 minutes.
Very easy to park on street.
